mapper.sql:
a.id AS "id", a.couse_id AS "course.id", a.multiple_title AS "multipleTitle", a.answerA AS "answera", a.answerB AS "answerb", a.answerC AS "answerc", a.answerD AS "answerd", a.multiple_answer AS "multipleAnswer", a.degree AS "degree", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.is_delete AS "isDelete",

mapper.insert: INSERT INTO multiplechoice( id, couse_id, multiple_title, answerA, answerB, answerC, answerD, multiple_answer, degree, create_time, is_delete ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{course.id}, #{multipleTitle}, #{answera}, #{answerb}, #{answerc}, #{answerd}, #{multipleAnswer}, #{degree}, #{createTime}, 0 )
mapper.update: UPDATE multiplechoice SET couse_id = #{course.id}, multiple_title = #{multipleTitle}, answerA = #{answera}, answerB = #{answerb}, answerC = #{answerc}, answerD = #{answerd}, multiple_answer = #{multipleAnswer}, degree = #{degree}, create_time = #{createTime} WHERE id = #{id}
